replies.body:
Great update this should make the game more fun and effective
However, like a normal human being riot is, you left out two things:

**Items sets** (so its easier to buy items in game)
and a visual bug: **Graves Cigar** still isn't visible 

Also love the Karma skin.
I agree. Riot, ITEM SETS, it's the only reason I'm not using the new client.
Yeah agreed, Kled can swear but Graves can't have a cigar, good thing new Snow Day Graves sucks on a candy cane. Item sets as well please.
I still can't spectate anyone yet, I'm not sure why? (Alpha Client)
I think they might have removed it, the only I know is you can download replays in game and re-watch it. Otherwise I would prefer the old client

Well I thought they removed it to. But, I went to the old client and you can spectate people.
So I don't know why they haven't added it to the alpha client yet.
well if you read the patch notes, it says the feature will be added back in partway through patch 6.24
I love these overused memes

OH GOD, kat is getting a buff which is not good.
That nerf on the Crystal Sceptar is gonna hit hard on the squishy mid lane AP champs like syndra or something.
I don't understand how you make your decisions on which champions to buff and nerf in the off season. Twitch nerfed but cait and jhin unchanged. Ivern hardly nerfed at all. wtf
Cait and Jhin are in a good position, they don't need changes
i mean twitch had a 57% winrate cait and jhin both around 51%
you shut your face about jhin...i mean, if he is nerfed ill just main...i mean "play" another adc...
{{champion:69}}
{{champion:84}}
how do you go back to the old client layout?
give us the option back to create our own item selections before starting game please..
I think you should think about adding a Skins tab to the profile screen so like the champion tab you can see all of your skins in one easy to access place.
when does the winter summoner's rift come out :O
can't wait for it too!
I don't get why you guys decide to not enable player amount sorting in the custom game list.
I miss the old ambience in the hextech crafting menu. At least give it something.
Rito pls, what happened to the {{champion:429}} buffs. Kalista seems like she really needs some love right now (_not as much as lucian tho_)
Please bring back item sets </3 it makes life so much easier for everyone why get rid of it.
"league client update is currently unavailable". {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
ermagod new karma n braum skins...Must....get....{{summoner:4}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
excuses me rioto but these skins are already out and i was wondering why u put them in the upcoming skin department
I think that Shyvana should get 5 armor and magic resist for each Dragon that she has killed and, only get it once for Baron and Elder Dragon killed.
